casebody.data:
Frank D’ALBA, Plaintiff in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 1, 1925.) No. 378. M. T. Abruzzo and John C. Judge, both of Brooklyn, N. Y., for plaintiff in error. Ralph C. Greene, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y. (William A. De Groot, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for the United States.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
